name: Haunting Curse
description: Curse an enemy with a destructive rune, dealing 2999 Magic Damage to the target and 1379 Magic Damage to all other nearby enemies after 3.5 seconds.  The curse will continue to haunt the enemy and explode a second time, dealing 2999 Magic Damage to the target and 1379 Magic Damage to all other nearby enemies after an additional 8.5 seconds.  You can have only one Haunting Curse active at a time.
effectLines: The curse will continue to haunt the enemy and explode a second time.
coefDescription: Curse an enemy with a destructive rune, dealing $1 Magic Damage to the target and $2 Magic Damage to all other nearby enemies after 3.5 seconds.  The curse will continue to haunt the enemy and explode a second time, dealing $3 Magic Damage to the target and $4 Magic Damage to all other nearby enemies after an additional 8.5 seconds.  You can have only one Haunting Curse active at a time.
